docs.snippet: Chile's football team and fans are being encouraged not to celebrate their first goal in Friday's World Cup qualifier against Venezuela in memory of thousands who were tortured 40 years ago at the match's venue....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chile's football team and fans are being encouraged not to celebrate their first goal in Friday's World Cup qualifier against Venezuela in memory of thousands who were tortured 40 years ago at the match's venue.

headline.main: Calls for 'Silent Goal' as Chile Remembers Coup Victims
headline.print_headline: Calls for 'Silent Goal' as Chile Remembers Coup Victims

docs.snippet: A female U.S. Navy midshipman who accused three former naval academy football players of rape, asked a court on Thursday to prevent the academy's superintendent from deciding whether the men will face court-martial....
docs.lead_paragraph: A female U.S. Navy midshipman who accused three former naval academy football players of rape, asked a court on Thursday to prevent the academy's superintendent from deciding whether the men will face court-martial.

docs.snippet: Attorneys for a midshipman at the center of a sexual assault case against three ex-Navy football players have asked in a federal lawsuit filed Thursday that the Naval Academy's superintendent not be involved in deciding whether the men will be cou...
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorneys for a midshipman at the center of a sexual assault case against three ex-Navy football players have asked in a federal lawsuit filed Thursday that the Naval Academy's superintendent not be involved in deciding whether the men will be court-martialed.

headline.main: Lawsuit Filed in Naval Academy Sex Assault Case
